scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.build-css: sass sass/main.scss static/css/main.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace static/css/**/*.css
scripts.build-js: node build.js && yarn run build-global-nav && yarn run build-cookie-policy && yarn run build-intl-tel-input-utils
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .bundle static/js/cookie-policy.js static/js/global-nav.js
